thread.title: PAOLI, CHARLES

author: PAOLI, CHARLES
title: PAOLI, CHARLES
text: Bought this machine about 5 months ago makes the best coffee ever worth every penny. Great capachino but froth is Luke warm like every automatic machine I've tried. Made over 1200 coffees and 500 caps with no problems yet. I clean the machine every night use water filter and do descales when told to. Keep clean and machine should last a long time. I couldn't live without it anymore can't get this good a cup anywhere else. By one you won't be disappointed for the price.
